extended_tweet.full_text: We confirm that grassroots football, including all levels of the @NPLAustralia and @FFACup Preliminary Rounds, may continue to be played at this time in line with Government advice.

Dear @FFA,

Hi from Milan, a city of Italy, a nation of 60 million people currently in lockdown. We had a record 368 deaths today due to #COVID19 & you are making decisions on carrying on with football matches, despite a state of emergency declared in VIC?
